api

Interface IEntitySystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISerializable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISystem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntitySystem

    public interface IEntitySystem
extends ISerializable
    The interface for an EntitySystem, which holds all the entities.
    Author:
    Rhondu Smithwick, Tom Wu
